Welcome to genestboost’s documentation!¶

genestboost is an ML boosting library that separates the modeling algorithm from the boosting algorithm. The result is that you can boost any generic regression model, not just trees. Build a forward-thinking (forward-propagating) neural network if you wish, or build an ensemble of support vector machines if you would so desire. Mix and match link and loss functions at will.
